title: Create Runbooks and Incident Response Automation
description: Create Runbooks and Incident Response Automation.

effort_estimate.justification: Runbooks and incident response automation help in resolving incidents quickly and efficiently.

user_stories: As an operations engineer, I want to automate incident response so that I can resolve incidents quickly and efficiently.
business_rules: Alert response procedures must be created.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After INF-005-A and INF-005-B are completed

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure runbooks and incident response automation are properly implemented.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the runbooks and incident response automation system to prevent unauthorized access.
